k = int(input())
s = str(input())

print(s[0:k] + "...") if len(s) > k else print(s)

k, s = input(), input()
if k > len(s):
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')


k, s = input(), input()
if k >= len(s):
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')

n, s = int(input()), input()
if n > len(s):
    print(s, end='')
else:
    print(s[:n] + '...', end='')

s = str(input())
